msContents.summary: List of expenses given for the Tiruvātirai festival celebrated in Chidambaram. The inscription includes donations of gold coins kācuto śrīmaheśvaras, reciters of Tiruttoṇṭattokai, weavers, oil sellers, merchants, among others.

handDesc.p: According to epigraphist, from line 7 takkaṇalāṭamum, “the wording is quite differente from that of the other published inscriptions”.

tirumaṇṇi vaḷara Irunilamaṭantaiyum poṟcayappāvaiyum cirttaṉil celviyum taṉ peruntēviyarāki Iṉpuṟa neṭuntuyilūḻiyuḷ ḷiṭaittuṟaināṭu tuṭarvaṉveli
p paṭarvaṉavāciyum cuḷḷiccūḻmakiḷ koḷḷippākkamum naṇṇaṟkarumuraṇ maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porukaṭa liḻattaracar tam muṭiyu māṅkavaṉ ṟeviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyum maṉṉava
ṉ pakkal teṉṉavaṉ vaitta cuntaramuṭiyum Intiraṉ Āramum teṇṭirai Iḻamaṇṭalamuḻuvatu meṟipaṭai-k kēraḷaṉ muṟaimayiṟ cūṭuṅ kulataṉam-ākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyum ceṅ
katir mālaiyuñ ceṅkatirvelai tol peruṅkāvaṟ paḻantivum ceruviṟ ciṉavi lirupattorukā laracukaḷai kaṭṭa paracurāmaṉ melvaruñ cāttākimaṟṟivaṉecāntimattivaraṇ karutiyiruttiya cempoṟṟirutta
ku muṭiyum payaṅkoṭu paḻimika muyaṅki mutukiṭṭoḷitta ceyaciṅkaḷaṉaruḷa-p perumpukaḻoṭu piṭiyil iraṭṭaipātai Eḻarai Ilakkamum navaneti-k kulapperumalaikaḷum vikkiramavira cakkara
koṭṭamum mutirpaṭavallai matura-maṇṭalamun tkāmaṭaivaḷaiyamum nāmaṇaaikkoṇamaiyum nāmaṇaikkoṇaiyum veñciṉavira-p pañcappaḷḷiyum pācaṭaippaḻaṉa mācuṇitēcamum Ayarvil vaṇkir
tti Ātiṉakaravaiyil cantiraṉ tolnalattirukulattintirarataṉaiviḷai Amarkkaḷattu-k kiḷai paṭittu-p palataṉattoṭu ntiṟaikalaulataṉa-k kuvaiyuñ ciṭṭaruñ ceṟipuṉa loṭṭaviṣaiyamum pūcurar ceru naṟko
calanāṭun taṉmapālaṉai vemmuṉai aḻittu vaṇṭamarcōlai kaṇṭaputtiyu miraṇacūraṇai muraṇaṟa tākki-t tikkeṇkirtti-t takkaṇalāṭamum varākavelkoṭi Irācaparicciṉṉamum Iṉaiyaṉa
palavu muṉaivaiyiṟ kavantu poṟkaḷavaṉattu-p pārttivārāṉār muṉṉaruñ ceytaṟiyātu piṉṉaruñceytu meṉṟeṇṇi-t tariyātu kaikalantaṉaṉōr paṭaiyārttaṉa tirumēṉiyil cempuṉal poḻiya
vīramaṟkaḷattu vicaiyapiṣekañ ceytu virasiṃhāḷaṉan tiriyaviṭṭaruḷi-k kaṅkāpuri pukuntaruḷi-t taṉ ṟirukkulattiyāvaruñ ceytaṟiyātatu vāḻiya Oḻukkan toṉṟi-t taṉ ṟirukkātalaṉ-ākiya veṉṟiṟ teriyaṟ kaṅ
kaikoṇṇtacōḻaṉaiyu māṅkavaṉ ṟirumakaṉ-ākiya virunilaṅ kāvalāḷavanta perumāḷaiyum Oṅkeḻilvaḷavaṉ mummuṭicōḻaṇaiyum Iṅkavaṉṟampi veṉṟiṟal mikupaṭai viracōḻaṉaiyum veḷ maturāntakaṉai
yun tarāpati tirumaka ṉirājentiracōḻaṉaiyum Irumuṭicōḻaṉ rājarājaṉ curuti naṉkuṇaruñ cōḻa-pāṇṭiyaṉaiyum varicilaittāṉai-k karikāla-cōḻaṉaiyum cōḻakaṅkaṉōṭu kaḻaluttama-cōḻaneṉṟivar tamakku veṉṟa
nāmaṅ kuṭutta-t tirumuṭi cūṭṭi-t teṉṉavariruvā mutaliṉarkku-t taṉ kulamaḷittuttārkkaṭavilaṅkaiyil poṟpuravi naṭātti viṟaṟpaṭaikka?kāmaṉ viracalāmekaṉai-k kaṭarkkaḷiṟṟōṭum akappaṭa-p piṭittu-k katirmuṭi-t
talai taṭintu muṉaivayiṟ pakaittu vantiḻi caḷukki yaṅkeyatiṉa paripava miṉṉanāḷi likalamarceytu niṅkuvateṉṟu kaṭal kiḷarntaṉa kiḷarpaṭai parappi Ārkali muṭakkāṟṟil caḷukki keṭṭuṭaitara Āṅkavaṉai Irumuṭime
ṉ koṇṭa kōvirācakecaripatmarāṉ Utaiyār śrīrājentira-cōḻa-tēvaṟku yāṇṭu 2 10 4 vatu Uṭaiyār rājentira-cōḻa-tēvar Aṇukki nakkaṉ pāvai Uṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalam-Uṭaiyār tiruvāṉittirunāḷil Uṭaiyāre

ḻa-p periḷamai-nāṭṭu-p parākrama-cōḻa-nallūṟpāṟ kuṇamenṉkaipurameṉ ṟeṟiṉa nakarattukku-p piramāṇappaṭi koṇṭa nilaṉ nāṟpatteḻaraiyum tillai Aḻaka-nallūr nilattil vilai koṇṭuṭaiya tokkapāṭi

ṉ muṉṟarai nikki nilaṉum Ākka kuṇamenakaipurattōṭum Eṟiṉa virivu nilaṉ Eḻuvatteṭṭekālē Araikkāṇi Itil Oṭaikaḷālum nāraikā?āṟṟālum kōllaikaḷālum nattaṅkaḷālum
niṅku nilaṉ muppattu nālē kālē Araikkāṇi nikki viḷai nilaṉ nāṟpattu nālveli Itu pala kiṭappiṉālum rājentraciṅkaṉ marakkālukku-k kalattuvāy-t tūṇi Iḷaiyamaṟakkkālāl varicai Iṭṭapaṭi nellu nālāyirattu Aiññūṟṟu-k-kalam Itil melvārattāluṭaiya
nellu Iraṇṭāyira-t tirunūṟṟaimpatiṉkalum Ivai kācu Oṉṟukku nellu Eṇkalanē tūṇi-p patakkāka vanta kācu Irunūṟṟurupattun mukkālum kuṇamenakai purattu-k kālaḷavu kolcūvi Uḷḷiṭṭa Aṅkāṭi-p pāṭṭattukku vaikka-k kaṭava kācu nāṟpatiṉālum Ākka kācu muṉṉūṟ
